Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Fire a Laser Pistol at the target.
使用激光手枪攻击目标。
Fire a Laser Rifle at the target.
使用激光步枪攻击目标。
Fire a laser blast at the target.
向目标发射激光冲击波。
Fire a Laser Cannon at the target.
向目标发射激光加农炮。
Strike the target with a Laser Sword.
Overcharge the Laser Cannon to fire a massive, focused blast.
过载激光加农炮，发射一道高能聚焦冲击波。

This unit's Laser weapons ignore up to {armorPenetration}[armor/] and have a {strengthCharred}[strengthThermal/] strength chance ({CharredRepeatingChance}[strengththermal/] for repeating attacks) of applying [abilityred]Charred[/abilityred] for {durationCharred}[turn/].
该单位的激光武器可无视最多 {armorPenetration}[armor/]，并有 {strengthCharred}[strengthThermal/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {CharredRepeatingChance}[strengththermal/] 几率）施加[abilityred]烧焦[/abilityred]，持续 {durationCharred}[turn/]。
This unit's Laser weapons have a {BlindChance} strength chance to [abilityred]Blind[/abilityred] units for {duration}[turn/].
该单位的激光武器有 {BlindChance} 力量几率[abilityred]致盲[/abilityred]目标，持续 {duration}[turn/]。
This unit's Laser weapons gain an extra level of [abilityred]Stagger Impact[/abilityred].
该单位的激光武器额外获得 1 级[abilityred]动摇冲击[/abilityred]。

This unit's Laser weapons have a {burningchance}[strengththermal/] strength chance ({BurningRepeatingChance}[strengththermal/] for repeating attacks) to set targets on fire, causing [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] for {duration}[turn/].
该单位的激光武器有 {burningchance}[strengththermal/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {BurningRepeatingChance}[strengththermal/] 几率）将目标点燃，施加[abilityred]燃烧[/abilityred]，持续 {duration}[turn/]。
This unit's Laser weapons gain [abilityred]Shield Overheat[/abilityred], disabling {ShieldBreakerAmount} per hit.
该单位的激光武器获得[abilityred]护盾过热[/abilityred]，每次命中可使 {ShieldBreakerAmount} 无效。

Laser weapon attacks destroy {DisintegratorArmorDestroy}[armor/] and have a {DisintegrateChance}[strengththermal/] strength chance ({DisintegrateRepeatingChance}[strengththermal/] for repeating attacks) to [abilityred]Disintegrate[/abilityred] Tier 1 and Tier 2 units. Disintegrated units are instantly killed and leave no corpse behind.

激光武器的攻击可摧毁 {DisintegratorArmorDestroy}[armor/] 并有 {DisintegrateChance}[strengththermal/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {DisintegrateRepeatingChance}[strengththermal/] 几率）[abilityred]瓦解[/abilityred] 1 阶和 2 阶单位。被瓦解的单位将会立即死亡且不会留下尸体。
A lightweight laser weapon designed to fire single, concentrated shots at short range.
一种轻型激光武器，可从远距离发射集中的单发炮弹。
Fire a Laser Repeater at the target.
使用激光连发枪攻击目标。
Fire Interception Blasters at the target
Fire a Particle Beam at the target.
向目标发射激光粒子束。
This unit has been marked, and is {percentageChance} easier to hit.
该单位已被标记，命中难度降低 {percentageChance}。
Fire an flurry of Laser fire at an area in front of the unit, dealing significant damage.
向单位前方范围发射一阵激光火焰，造成大量伤害。
Fire a focused Laser shot at a distant target. This shot will [abilityred]knock back[/abilityred] Light units.
向远距离目标发射一道聚焦激光，此攻击将[abilityred]击退[/abilityred]轻型单位。
Fire a ship mounted Laser Cannon at the target. Ignores the accuracy penalty against Flying units.
使用舰载激光加农炮攻击目标，无视对飞行单位的准度惩罚。
Fire a powerful blast from the tip of a Laser spear.
从激光长矛的前端发射一道强力冲击波。
Strikes the target with a Laser-augmented lance.
使用激光强化长矛攻击目标。
Fire a lighter version of the Laser Cannon at the target.
使用轻型激光加农炮攻击目标。
Launches a large volley of Laser projectiles at the ground.
向地面发射一阵猛烈的激光射弹。
Fires a Laser blast at the target.
向目标发射一道激光冲击波。
Strikes the target with a Laser glaive.
使用激光阔剑攻击目标。
Throw an incendiary grenade dealing damage in an area of effect.
投掷一个燃烧手雷，造成范围效果伤害。
Fire a Laser Sniper rifle at the target.
使用激光狙击步枪攻击目标。
Fire a flurry of Laser fire at an area in front of the unit.
向单位前方范围发射一阵激光火焰。
Fire a repurposed glacier cutter at the target.
使用经过改装的冰川切割器攻击目标。
Fire a high-power Laser Cannon, fit for colony defense.
发射高能激光加农炮，适合用于殖民地防御。
Fire a focused Laser Burst at the target.
向目标发射一道聚焦激光脉冲。
Fire a Mounted Laser Repeater at the target.
使用搭载式激光连发枪攻击目标。
Fire the Rapid Laser Cannons at a target.
使用疾速激光加农炮攻击目标。

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
